page.title: 13MADELEY STAFFS : CRIME
page.content: As far as reported crime is concerned, this area of Madeley is very lawabiding The main offences are:-minor damage, petty theft from cars and burglaries from business premises.The offenders are mostly youngsters.There is also a little poaching.Villagers complain of young folk gathering,making noise with there motor-bikes,though this is legal. Advice on crime prevention is available to anyone.Local police sometimes visit schools in the area.In summer,the police helped by volunteers,run the Staffs Police Activity & Community ent- erprise scheme -SPACE- for the 10-16's. They offer fishing,sport,pleasure trips & discos.They also run a youth club in winter.This explains the lack of major crime here-& the central site of the police station!Anyone unlucky enough to be arrested is detained in Newcastle station,where the courts are at hand.
